items.title: Enterprise Partnership
items.description: Accompanying businesses in Vietnam and the SEA region to assess AI readiness, provide internal training, and implement AI in operations.

items.title: AI Talent Development
items.description: Developing AI training and internship models for young professionals to meet the future technology industry's workforce demands.

items.title: International Collaboration
items.description: Connecting and collaborating with international partners in AI, IoT, Robotics, cybersecurity, and big data fields.
